heading: Compare Health Insurance for Pre-Existing Conditions
subtitle: Get fast access to the treatment you need with an affordable health insurance policy that covers pre-existing conditions, allowing you to continue doing the things you love. Most standard insurance policies won’t cover you for pre-existing conditions, but some brokers do over coverage. Hospital Compare has selected the available brokers and listed them below. Read our guide to pre-existing conditions.

providers.description: 30 years' experience of providing fast access to diagnosis and private treatment for the over 50s.
We are the go-to broker for insurance if you live with a pre-existing medical condition.
We offer coverage for an additional premium for pre-existing medical conditions with our Private Health Insurance.
Are you looking for Private Medical Insurance that’s fully extensive or a plan that just covers the essentials.
